title: How to Make Flambeed Plums

steps.headline: Poach the pitted plums in the vanilla syrup.
steps.description: Poach until they just turn tender.

steps.headline: Drain the plums and place them in a casserole dish.
Mix a little arrowroot with water to form a watery paste.

steps.headline: Sprinkle with brandy once poached.

text: Poach the pitted plums in the vanilla syrup. Poach until they just turn tender. Drain the plums and place them in a casserole dish.  Mix a little arrowroot with water to form a watery paste. Add this to the vanilla syrup. Pour the blended syrup over the plums. Heat over the stovetop.  Sprinkle with brandy once poached. Light the brandy to flame the plums and serve at once.
